dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: Hi, how are you doing?

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: I'm fine. How about yourself?

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: I'm pretty good. Thanks for asking.

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: No problem. So how have you been?

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: I've been great. What about you?

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: I've been good. I'm in school right now.

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: What school do you go to?

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: I go to PCC.

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: Do you like it there?

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: It's okay. It's a really big campus.

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: Good luck with school.

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: Thank you very much.

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: It's an ugly day today.

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: I know. I think it may rain.

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: It's the middle of summer, it shouldn't rain today.

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: That would be weird.

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: Yeah, especially since it's ninety degrees outside.

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: I know, it would be horrible if it rained and it was hot outside.

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: Yes, it would be.

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: I really wish it wasn't so hot every day.

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: Me too. I can't wait until winter.

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: I like winter too, but sometimes it gets too cold.

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: I'd rather be cold than hot.

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: Me too.

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: It's such a nice day.

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: Yes, it is.

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: It looks like it may rain soon.

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: Yes, and I hope that it does.

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: Why is that?

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: I really love how rain clears the air.

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: Me too. It always smells so fresh after it rains.

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: Yes, but I love the night air after it rains.

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: Really? Why is it?

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: Because you can see the stars perfectly.

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: I really hope it rains today.

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: Yeah, me too.

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: I really want to go to the beach this weekend.

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: That sounds like fun. What's the weather going to be like?

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: I heard that it's going to be warm this weekend.

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: Is it going to be perfect beach weather?

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: I believe so.

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: Good. I hope it doesn't cool off this weekend.

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: I know. I really want to go to the beach.

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: But you know that California weather is really unpredictable.

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: You're right. One minute it's hot, and then the next minute it's cold.

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: I really wish the weather would just stay the same.

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: I do too. That way we can have our activities planned ahead of time.

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: Yeah, that would make things a lot easier.

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: Hello, may I speak to Alice please?

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: This is she. How's it going?

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: I've been trying to call you all day.

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: Sorry about that. I was cleaning up.

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: It's okay.

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: So what were you calling me about?

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: Oh, I just wanted to see if you wanted to hang out tomorrow.

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: Sure, what did you want to do?

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: Maybe we can go see a movie or something.

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: That sounds like fun. Let's do it.

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: I'll see you tomorrow then.

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: See you then. Goodbye.

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: Have you seen the new girl in school?

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: No, I haven't.

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: She's really pretty.

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: Describe her to me.

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: She's not too tall.

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: Well, how tall is she?

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: She's about five feet even.

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: What does she look like, though?

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: She has pretty light brown eyes.

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: I may know which girl you're talking about.

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: So you have seen her around?

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: Yes, I have.

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: Why weren't you at school yesterday?

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: I wasn't really feeling well.

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: What was wrong with you?

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: My stomach was upset.

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: Do you feel better now?

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: I don't really feel too well yet.

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: Do you want anything to make you feel better?

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: No, thanks. I already took some medicine.

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: I hope you feel better.

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: Thank you.

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: Did you hear the good news?

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: No, I haven't.

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: I got a promotion at my job.

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: Did you really?

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: Seriously, I am so excited.

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: Well, congratulations.

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: Thank you.

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: I'm so happy for you.

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: Really?

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: Yes. You really deserved this.

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: You think so?

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: Yes. Good for you.

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: You look really nice today.

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: Thank you. I just got this outfit the other day.

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: Really, where did you get it?

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: I got it from Macy's.

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: It's really nice.

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: Thanks again. You look nice today, too.

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: Thank you. I just got these shoes today.

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: Really? What kind of shoes are they?

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: These are called All Star Chuck Taylors.

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: I really like those. How much did they cost?

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: They were about forty dollars.

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: I think I'm going to go buy myself a pair.

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: Tell me, what do you enjoy doing in your spare time?

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: I enjoy drawing and painting.

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: You know how to draw and paint?

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: Yes, I do.

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: When did you learn how to do that?

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: I learned back in high school.

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: Oh, so you took an art class?

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: Yeah, I loved that class.

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: I see that you're pretty talented.

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: Thank you very much.

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: I wish I had a talent like that.

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: I'm sure you have a talent. It's just hidden.

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: What's your favorite movie?

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: My favorite movie is Superbad.

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: Oh, why is that?

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: It's the funniest movie that I've ever seen.

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: That's true. It is a very funny movie.

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: You've seen it before?

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: Yes, I saw that movie the first day it came out in theaters.

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: Didn't you laugh through the whole movie? I did.

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: Me too. That movie brought tears to my eyes.

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: Mine too.

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: I have it on DVD at my house if you want to come over and watch it.

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: Sure, let's go.

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: What type of music do you like to listen to?

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: I like listening to different kinds of music.

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: Like what, for instance?

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: I enjoy Rock and R&B.

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: Why is that?

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: I like the different instruments that they use.

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: That's a good reason to like something.

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: Yeah, I think so too.

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: Did you go to the basketball game on Friday?

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: No, I couldn't make it.

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: You missed a really good game.

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: Oh, really? Who won?

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: Our school did. They played really well.

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: Too bad I was busy. I really wanted to go.

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: Yeah, you should have. It was really exciting.

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: So what was the score?

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: The score was 101-98.

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: Man, that was a really close game.

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: That's what made it so great.

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: I'll make sure and make it to the next one.

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: What are you doing this weekend?

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: I'm going to the movies with a friend. How about you?

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: I'm not sure yet.

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: Well, did you want to go see a movie with me?

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: What movie are you going to see?

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: I'm not sure yet. Is there something you want to see?

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: There's nothing I can think of.

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: So, did you want to go?

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: No, thanks, maybe another time.

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: Okay, sounds good.

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: Did you go to school today?

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: Yeah, I went to school today. Were you there?

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: No, I didn't go, I've been sick.

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: That sucks. Did you want the assignments from English class?

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: That would be nice, thank you.

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: No problem, you're welcome.

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: I will be glad to do the same for you when you're sick.

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: Well, thank you. I hope to see you at school tomorrow.

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: Did you hear the news?

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: What happened?

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: Our cousin went into labor and had her baby last week.

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: She did? Why didn't anyone tell me?

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: I would've thought that somebody would have told you.

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: No, I had no idea.

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: Well, she did, her baby was 8 pounds 6 ounces.

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: Oh my God, that's great!

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: Are you going to go and visit her and the baby?

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: I think that I might.

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: Good! I just thought I'd let you know.

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: Thanks for telling me.

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: Did you go to school today?

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: Of course. Did you?

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: I didn't want to, so I didn't.

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: That's sad, but have you gone to the movies recently?

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: That's a switch.

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: I'm serious, have you?

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: No, I haven't. Why?

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: I really want to go to the movies this weekend.

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: So go then.

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: I really don't want to go by myself.

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: Well anyway, do you plan on going to school tomorrow?

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: No, I think I'm going to go to the movies.

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: Thanks for coming to see me today.

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: It's no problem. I was really missing you anyway.

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: I missed you too.

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: Why haven't you tried to come see me then?

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: I've been really busy.

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: Doing what?

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: Working.

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: I would've come to see you sooner, but I've been busy too.

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: What have you been doing?

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: I've been working too.

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: Well regardless, I'm very happy that you came to see me.

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: I am too.

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: Hey, did you hear about Jessica's party this weekend?

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: Yeah, but I'm still waiting for my invitation.

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: Oh really? She gave me mine earlier today.

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: Well, she'll probably just give me my invitation later on today.

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: Yeah, so are you planning on going?

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: I think so. It sounds like it's going to be a lot of fun.

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: It really does, I can't wait.

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: What time does the party start?

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: It starts at 8 o'clock.

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: Oh, well, how many people has she given invites to so far?

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: I'm not sure, but I don't think she's given out that many.

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: Well, hopefully she'll give me my invite later on today.

https://www.eslfast.com/robot/topics/sma.topic: Accepting an Invitation to a Party

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: Hey, what's up?

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: Nothing really.

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: I'm throwing a party on Friday.

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: I didn't realize that.

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: You didn't?

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: Nobody has told me anything about your party.

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: Did you want to go?

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: When does it start?

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: At 8:00 p.m.

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: I'll be there.

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: I'd better see you there.

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: Of course.

https://www.eslfast.com/robot/topics/sma.topic: Declining an Invitation to a Party (1)

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: What's going on?

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: Nothing really, you?

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: I'm throwing a party next Saturday.

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: Is that right?

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: Yeah, are you going to come?

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: I'm sorry, I can't.

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: Why not?

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: I don't really want to.

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: Well, why don't you?

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: I hate going to parties.

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: Well, that's okay.

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: Yeah, sorry.

https://www.eslfast.com/robot/topics/sma.topic: Declining an Invitation to a Party (2)

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: What's up?

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: Nothing much, what's going on?

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: I'm having a party this Friday.

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: Oh, really? That's nice.

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: I wanted to see if you wanted to come.

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: This Friday? Sorry, I already have plans.

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: Doing what?

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: I'm going to dinner with my family.

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: I really wanted you to come, but I understand.

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: Yeah, maybe next time.

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: I'll hold you to that.

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: Sounds like a plan.

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: It was nice talking to you.

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: Why are you trying to rush me off the phone?

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: I really have to go.

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: Why? I still wanted to talk to you.

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: I have things to do.

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: Like what?

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: Don't be nosey.

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: I'm not. I just want to know.

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: Well, it's really none of your business.

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: That's harsh.

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: I'm sorry, but I have to go.

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: Fine.

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: Well, it was nice talking to you.

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: It was nice talking to you too.

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: We should really hang out again.

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: That would be fun.

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: Where do you want to go?

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: I think we should go out to eat.

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: That sounds good.

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: All right, so I'll see you then.

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: I'll call you later.

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: Okay, I'll talk to you later then.

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: See you later.

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: Bye.
